message:
RT @Meligy: So the deal did actually work!
RT @VTTechnology: 

Microsoft to acquire Nokia's device and services division for $7B:
http://t.co/hgntKMKt1u
name: Microsoft to acquire Nokia's device and services division
caption: news.cnet.com
description: As part of $7.1 billion deal, Nokia CEO Stephen Elop will step down to become an executive vice president of the division. Read this article by Steven Musil on CNET News.
